dcterms:description: MC2 is the largest open-source corpus of minority languages in China, focusing on Tibetan, Uyghur, Kazakh (Arabic script), and Mongolian (traditional script). It emphasizes quality and cultural awareness in NLP.
dcterms:title: MC2 (Multilingual Corpus of Minority Languages in China)
